metadata.synopsis: Plig stops in between the two goblin pens in front of the altar the goblins have decorated and fires this AD. She fires thes eindividually, musing to herself on patrol.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plig stops in between the two goblin pens in front of the altar the goblins have decorated and fires this AD. She fires one, walks her patrol and returns, then fires another.

0.speaker: Warrior Plig
0.text: I'm famished. Maybe the worgs won't notice if I rob a bitta meat...
0.context: InternalNodeContext: There is a chopping block with wood nearby where meat is on the slab, she is referring to this

1.speaker: Warrior Plig
1.text: Good thing we rolled in 'ere. Place is starting to look proper homey.

2.speaker: Warrior Plig
2.text: Wish I got a turn at the bear. Lucky.
